author: Simon Difford
description: With freshly squeezed juice, this is a sight tastier than its reputation might suggest. Long and refreshing. Spiked fresh orange juice with Southern Comfort and hints of sloe berry fruit.
name: Slow Comfortable Screw
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
FLOAT sloe gin on surface so it bleeds into drink
